lines.text:
[after sex]
Where are you going?

[Bitter]
Out. I wanna talk, I wanna chat.
We can talk. I just don't want something up my ass while we're doing it.

[about talking during sex]
I'll talk as much as I like.
Yeah? Well I hope she likes it 'cause you won't be fucking me.
Come on, she told me, that the two of you were together, or whatever, just...
That's what I thought. Well look, there's really nothing else I can show you here then. I mean, if you're done looking, right?
You know, you could show me why she'd be interested in someone like you.
Maybe because I don't say stupid fucking things like that to people.
What do these characters all have in common? They all want to... fuck! It's always about fucking.
[During sex]
Is there any chance you could shut the fuck up?
Do you think you're good?
What?
I mean, do you think you're a good person?
Hey, come on, I'm trying to eat lunch here.
I don't get you at all. I mean, always with the goddamn semiotics. It's a gift. Can't it just be what it is? It's a bracelet. Shit.
Grow the fuck up.
The guy's practically my best friend...
Oh, don't even fucking use that! Alright? Best friend? That is bullshit! Try saying friend when you're down there lapping between his wife's legs. See how it sounds then.
It's over. Thanks so much, it was lovely. I'll get the rest of my stuff later.
Why do you find it so hard to fathom that I'd want to be with a woman? I mean, I wanted to be with you. Now I want to be with her. That's all.
So, you want to know what the best lay I ever had? Right. That's easy, it's me. Nobody gives me more pleasure than I give myself
I'm telling you, nobody makes me come the way I do.

[after much prodding by Barry]
Ok. The best fuck I ever had. That would be your wife. That was the best fuck I ever had.
That beats my story.
I just think for right now, we need to treat each other like... meat. Right? Didn't we read that? You need to see me as a - a big - a penis. And you need to be just this huge vagina... to me.
Life is complicated. It's a funny world. People can't communicate. And you couldn't keep your erection.
Okay, I see. You're a real piece of work, you know that?
That's great.
Nobody actually likes you, you're aware of this?
Are you for real? Nobody likes you either.
I don't get your kind. You women are all the same. You give my friend nothing but grief, always coming off like some dyke bitch. How do you live with yourself?
What the fuck is the matter with you? You treat women like sex objects then real people.

Hey, you don't want to have a drink with me, that's fine. I can take a hint. I have a healthy self image. But you keep dicking around people I know and one of these days I'm gonna find you and I'm gonna knock you on your ass. You are a useless cunt! Get use to it!
